title: Why can’t education technology save remote learning? - Quora

response.answer_text: Education technology already saves remote learning. Using the education technology you can: Upload electronic content for the course or subject material using LMS and enable your students to download from their portal remotely.You can upload video lessons using LMS and your students can watch the lesson video from their portal remotely.You can meet your students remotely online using virtual classrooms software that will enable you to meet your students remotely and give the session as if you and your students are meeting physically face to face.Upload assignments online and your students can download them, solve them, and even upload them online for the teachers to mark them and put the grade for each assignment for each student. All this is remotely using the SIS and LMS educational technology.Create Online Quiz and your students can sit for a timed quiz remotely and the system can automatically grade the quiz and reflect its mark automatically in the grading report using the automated grading system. Even more, the students can review their grading report remotely from the students portal.Create class schedule for your students to review it from their portal remotely.Communicate with your students through the messaging system so you can send and receive messages remotely.All the above and much more you can achieve using the educational technology which enables the educators, instructors, or teachers to interact remotely with their students in an efficient way of learning.
